articles.description: Follow live text, radio commentary and score updates as PSG take on Inter Milan in the UEFA Champions League Final at the Allianz Arena in Munich.
articles.title: PSG vs Inter Milan LIVE: Champions League final score, radio & live updates

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC radio commentary from the French Open as Cameron Norrie plays Jacob Fearnley on day seven at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Draper vs Fonseca & Norrie vs Fearnley -  tennis scores, results & order of play at Roland Garros

articles.description: McLaren's Oscar Piastri will start the Spanish Grand Prix on pole position, beating team-mate Lando Norris.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2025: Oscar Piastri beats McLaren team-mate Lando Norris to pole in Barcelona

articles.description: Luis Enrique's thrilling young Paris St-Germain side are on the verge of history. Phil McNulty explains how they got there.
articles.title: PSG v Inter Milan: Can Luis Enrique's PSG young guns land elusive Champions League crown?

articles.description: Early in his career, Francesco Acerbi overcame alcoholism, depression and cancer twice. Now, at 37, he is Champions League finalists Inter's unlikely star.
articles.title: PSG v Inter: How Champions League finalist Francesco Acerbi beat cancer, alcohol abuse and depression

articles.description: John Heitinga leaves his role as Liverpool's assistant boss to return to Dutch club Ajax as their head coach.
articles.title: Ajax: John Heitinga leaves Liverpool role to rejoin Dutch club as head coach

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper underlines his status as a French Open contender with a ruthless victory over Brazilian rising star Joao Fonseca.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Jack Draper beats Joao Fonseca to reach Roland Garros fourth round

articles.description: New Orleans Pelicans player Zion Williamson is accused of rape in a civil lawsuit filed in Los Angeles on Friday.
articles.title: NBA player Zion Williamson accused of rape in civil lawsuit

articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes rules out playing flag football at the Los Angeles 2028 Olympics.
articles.title: LA 2028: Patrick Mahomes rules out playing in flag football's Olympic debut

articles.description: Simon Yates produces a stunning performance on the penultimate stage of the Giro d'Italia to snatch the pink jersey from Isaac del Toro and claim his second Grand Tour title.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Simon Yates snatches lead on penultimate stage to claim second Grand Tour title
